entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
